I also brought in a new char, but he's basically the fourth heir to 
Optimus Primals leadership as leaders of the Malacons (in the future 
they evolve from the group in Beast Machines and want to stamp out the 
Anglions for turning down Vector Sigma). I can understand changing BM, 
but can we at least say Primal started a minor religions around Vector 
Sigma and the Organic Core liquid?
